p: Twenty-four hours post-transfection, tissue culture supernatants of the A549-IFN-Luc cells, an A549 derivative cell line stably expressing photinus pyralis luciferase under control of tandem repeats of the IFN stimulated response element, were replaced with Beetle Lysis-Juice luciferase substrate (p.j.k.) and luciferase activity was quantified using the EnVision Multilabel Reader (Perkin Elmer).
